name: Hampton Inn and Suites Cleveland Airport / Middleburg Heights

reviews.title: Tiny rooms
reviews.text: We spent a quick overnight in this hotel last night. The service was excellent, the room was very clean. Our only issue was that the room was tiny. We've never stayed in a Hampton Inn with rooms this cramped. For a family of four (2 adults, 2 kids - double Queen room) it was uncomfortable. We are not big people and we could not walk past each other in the room. The bathroom was like an alley. If you need a bit of space when you travel, choose another hotel in Middleburg Heights.

reviews.title: Typical Hampton Inn
reviews.text: Which I like, by the way. Clean, great breakfast, well located. The desk staff seem a bit preoccupied, but this was just a one-night stop while traveling, so we did not need much help.

reviews.title: Free Breakfast???
reviews.text: It seems as though there is a "bed tax" along with the room tax in Ohio. It was $9.00, and I asked if it could be waived if I slept on the floor, but they were not amused. The manager tried to help me understand the taxes in Ohio, but it was just too complicated.

reviews.title: Wonderful Stay
reviews.text: I stayed here on 8/25/12. Nice room. Nice staff. Went down to get my free breakfast at 9am and every bin was empty. I asked the lady at the front desk if she realized there was no food and she said "no, I didn't know that" i waited for some kind of response but she turned away. Think twice before staying here. Unless your fasting......

reviews.title: Enjoyed a very brief stay
reviews.text: This hotel has been renovated and is really a nice comfortable stay. There is a Max and Erma's across the street as well as a sub shop and a few more restauraunts nearby. The indoor pool was heated and was the perfect size and depth for our kids to swim in. Breakfast was good and the staff was friendly. Would stay again. We were visiting the nearby bike trail at Rocky River Reservation.

reviews.title: excellent
reviews.text: This hampton inn went the extra mile by offering a managers party in the evening, similar to the Embassy Suites. Pizza, beer, wine and snacks. It was a clean hotel and the service was great.

reviews.title: Great value, friendly helpful staff, renovated rooms
reviews.text: We heard a noise in the bathroom and looked to see a huge amount of water comming from the ceiling over the tub. Security checked and the person above, forgot to put the shower curtain in the tub..LOL

reviews.title: VERY PLEASED!!!
reviews.text: I would stay here again

reviews.title: Great hotel but absent minded
reviews.text: Just completed a one night stay. The hotel was just recently renovated. I mean everything is brand spanking new. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Free hot breakfast included eggs, omelet or waffles. Lots of additional cereals, muffins bagels, fruit, yogurt. Close to airport and interstate 71. About a 20 ride to downtown Cleveland.

reviews.title: A Hampton that should be benchmark for other Hamptons!
reviews.text: My daughter was married last weekend and Hampton Inn handled the accomadations. Even though there were many mix ups and some people were not as pleased, I can honestly say that the staff treated me like a queen. I had called and needed an additional night that was scheduled and they took care of me, I didnt have to change rooms, they brought me a crib for my granddaughter and even allowed me to borrow two plants that I loved and wanted for the ceremony. My stay was perfect and I thank you, Cathye Williams. PS...There beds are great!

reviews.title: Good spot for business traveler
reviews.text: Most everything was great about this hotel for the business traveler; friendly & efficient check in, comfortable bed, micro/fridge, good internet speed, big, well stocked breakfast room, nice shower, bathroom counter and lighting were excellent, and even THREE electrical plugs on the night stand so I could plug in all my electronics.

reviews.title: Excellent Stay !!!!
reviews.text: The tiniest of faults – the closet clothes rod was so close to the upper shelve that I had a hard time getting my hangers on it, and every one of the four packages of coffee for the in-room coffeemaker were Decaf (really??)

reviews.title: Perfect for our group
reviews.text: Stayed @ the Hampton Inn, Airport, Cleveland, Ohio...last Saturday, while visiting nearby friends.Room was great, bedding very comfortable !!! Bath & shower was extremely clean...Hotel was very well kept, and the included breakfast was great !!!! I was impressed !!!

reviews.title: A VERY nice Hampton
reviews.text: ...also used this little gadget that I saw for the first time...here !! Traveling with all the electronic gadgets, that I do...there is seldom enough electric outlets available...without moving, beds, TV's, tables...etc !!!! Well this Hampton had this little device, called the "Cubie" !!!! 3 outlets, & 2 USB charge ports, built right into one little 4"X4" cube...and it was affixed to the night stand, next to the bed !!! Well this little device,so impressed me that I contacted the company that makes them, and purchased one for myself...!!! So this review is not only a good "Plug" for the Hampton, Airport...Cleveland, Ohio....but also for "Brandstand" products...and their "Cubie"....!!!!!!

reviews.title: Clean and Comfy
reviews.text: Thanks for reading

reviews.title: Find somewhere else
reviews.text: When I book a 5 night stay as a diamond member I expect the room I book...so when I check in and get a double queen room instead of a king I'm less than pleased. Then when it smells like smoke I'm seriously disappointed. The pleasant and friendly on-duty manager politely informed me that sorry there's nothing to be done. Even more disappointed.

reviews.title: Great Stay
reviews.text: The hotel is clean quiet and the staff is friendly and helpful. They also have a mid week managers reception on Tuesday and Wednesday.

reviews.title: 2nd time is not so much a charm :(
reviews.text: Unfortunately these things were not enough to overcome the aforementioned problems. Good enough for sleeping but not enough to recommend.

reviews.title: You know what your getting with Hamptons
reviews.text: Stayed for 3 nights and the entire hotel was super. The entire staff were friendly and professional. The were extremely helpful and went out of their way to accomodate our party. I will stay here agin when in this area.

reviews.title: Great hotel
reviews.text: I have to wonder if my expectations were too high based off my visit just a little over 3 months ago. After posting a glowing review, I really hate that I have to complain about this stay. http://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g50651-d122197-Reviews-Hampton_Inn_and_Suites_Cleveland_Airport_Middleburg_Heights-Middleburg_Heights_Ohio.html

aka: Hampton Inn And Suites Cleveland Airport / Middleburg Heights Hotel
description: The Hampton Inn & Suites Cleveland Airport/Middleburg Heights is conveniently located near both the Cleveland Hopkins International Airport and the I-X Convention Center. Our hotel has 97 guestrooms, suites and accessible rooms to accommodate all of your traveling needs. In addition to the free hot breakfast, fresh Hampton Bed and free high speed internet in every room, our hotel proudly offers the 100% Hampton Guarantee on every stay.
